起.definition: to rise; to raise; to get up; to set out; to start; to appear; to launch; to initiate (action); to draft; to establish; to get (from a depot or counter); verb suffix, to start; starting from (a time, place, price etc); classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance; classifier for groups: batch, group

起伏.definition: to move up and down; to undulate; ups and downs

起作用.definition: to have an effect; to play a role; to be operative; to work; to function

起來.definition: (after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state; indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4]); indicating completion; (after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment; also pr. [qi3lai5]

起價.definition: initial price (e.g. for the first kilometer); prices starting from

起初.definition: originally; at first; at the outset

起到.definition: (in an expression of the form 起到[qi3dao4] + … + 作用[zuo4yong4]) to have (a (motivating etc) effect); to play (a (stabilizing etc) role)

起動.definition: to start up (a motor); to launch (a computer application)

起名.definition: to name; to christen; to take a name

起名兒.definition: erhua variant of 起名[qi3 ming2]

起因.definition: cause; a factor (leading to an effect)

起圈.definition: to remove manure from a cowshed or pigsty etc (for use as fertilizer); to muck out

起夜.definition: to get up in the night to urinate

起子.definition: baking soda (used to leaven bread); screwdriver; bottle opener

起家.definition: to start out by; to grow an enterprise beginning with; to begin one's career by

起小兒.definition: erhua variant of 起小[qi3 xiao3]

起居.definition: everyday life; regular pattern of life

起居作息.definition: lit. rising and lying down, working and resting (idiom); fig. everyday life; daily routine; to go about one's daily life

起床.definition: to get out of bed; to get up

起床氣.definition: grumpiness resulting from poor sleep; irritability in the morning

起意.definition: to conceive a scheme; to devise a plan

起拍價.definition: starting bid; starting price (at an auction)

起早摸黑.definition: see 起早貪黑|起早贪黑[qi3 zao3 tan1 hei1]

起早貪黑.definition: to be industrious, rising early and going to bed late

起步.definition: to set out; to set in motion; the start (of some activity)

起步價.definition: starting price; base fare (for a taxi trip, construction project etc)

起死回生.definition: to rise from the dead (idiom); fig. an unexpected recovery

起泡.definition: to bubble; to foam; to blister; to sprout boils (on one's body); sparkling (wine etc)

起泡沫.definition: to emit bubbles; to bubble; to foam (with rage); to seethe

起源.definition: origin; to originate; to come from

起火.definition: to catch fire; to cook; to get angry

起爆.definition: to explode; to set off an explosion; to detonate

起球.definition: (of a sweater, fabric etc) to pill

起用.definition: to promote; to reinstate (in a position or job)

起眼.definition: to catch one's eye (usu. used in the negative)

起碼.definition: at the minimum; at the very least

起稿.definition: to make a draft; to draft (a document)

起航.definition: (of a ship) to set sail; (of an airplane) to take off

起色.definition: a turn for the better; to pick up; to improve

起草.definition: to make a draft; to draw up (plans)

起落.definition: to rise and fall; takeoff and landing; ups and downs

起見.definition: motive; purpose; (sth) being the motive or purpose

起訴.definition: to sue; to bring a lawsuit against; to prosecute

起誓.definition: to vow; to swear an oath

起跑.definition: to start running; the start of a race

起跑線.definition: the starting line (of a race); scratch line (in a relay race)

起跳.definition: (athletics) to take off (at the start of a jump); (of price, salary etc) to start (from a certain level)

起身.definition: to get up; to leave; to set forth

起迄.definition: start and end (dates); origin and destination

起運.definition: variant of 啟運|启运[qi3 yun4]

起重.definition: to lift (sth heavy) using a crane or other mechanical means

起開.definition: (dialect) to step aside; Get out of the way!

起降.definition: (of aircraft) to take off and land

起飛.definition: (of an aircraft or rocket) to take off; to lift off; (fig.) (of an enterprise etc) to start to develop rapidly

起鬨.definition: to heckle; rowdy jeering; to create a disturbance
